Library the needed packages.
```{r}
library(terra)

library(sf)

```


Load data in
```{r}

WorldMapShp <- st_read(here("Homework4",
                            "Materials", 
                            "World_Countries",
                            "World_Countries_Generalized.shp"))

WorldGenderData <- read_csv(here("Homework4",
                                 "materials", 
                                 "hdr-data.csv"))

```
